Title: Relates to notice to fire departments when oxygen is in use at a residence
Summary: Requires a medical equipment service agency that has supplied oxygen or an oxygen delivery system to a patient to notify the appropriate fire department or company serving the municipality in which the patient resides of the name, address, and age of the patient and the existence of the oxygen or oxygen delivery system at the patient's residence; provides for informed consent; requires notice to the fire department of removal of such equipment.
LawCode: Ren ยง3656 to be ยง3657, add ยง3656, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to notice to fire departments when oxygen is in use at a residence
